sampleData.notes: Feeling good overall, minor stress from exams

anxietyLevel.description: Self-reported anxiety level where 1 is minimal and 20 is severe

mentalHealthHistory.description: Whether the student has a documented mental health history

financialCondition.description: Whether the student has stable financial conditions

notes.description: Optional additional notes (not imported by the system)

importInstructions.step1: Prepare your Excel file with the required column headers
importInstructions.step2: Ensure data is in the first row after headers
importInstructions.step4: Click 'Import from Excel' button in the interface
importInstructions.step7: Click 'Save / Update Profile' to persist changes

validationRules.anxietyLevel: Auto-clamped to 1-20 range if outside bounds
validationRules.mentalHealthHistory: Converts 'Yes'/true to true, anything else to false
validationRules.headache: Auto-clamped to 1-5 range if outside bounds
validationRules.financialCondition: Converts 'Yes'/true to true, anything else to false
validationRules.safety: Auto-clamped to 1-5 range if outside bounds
